name: Nano
description: A synthetically programmed pioneer-infusion is planted into the soil. Based upon the present composition of the soil and minerals, architectural typologies respond accordingly through a process called polymorphism. When an infusion allocates iron, it responds with a "storage facility". When it allocated a large collection of Phosphor or Lithium, it responds with a mobile collection unit etc. Architecture today lends itself so an assembly of discrete functions and parts. Nano responds with a homogeneous assembly of a singular intelligent-material that can respond to the environment.
